remarks: The subword of a concatenation of two words within both of the concatenated words.  (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 5-Apr-2018.)  (Revised by Alexander van der Vekens, 27-May-2018.)
statement:
swrdccatin12.l $e |- L = ( # ` A ) $.
swrdccatin12 $p |- ( ( A e. Word V /\ B e. Word V ) -> ( ( M e. ( 0 ... L ) /\ N e. ( L ... ( L + ( # ` B ) ) ) ) -> ( ( A concat B ) substr <. M , N >. ) = ( ( A substr <. M , L >. ) concat ( B substr <. 0 , ( N - L ) >. ) ) ) ) $.
